TopicTitle: Would you buy expansion packs for KSP? How much?

Articles.Content: I would be willing to donate in the future to support devs but the would lose that money if the did in game purchases of any kind. I think full price is full price no matter what.
I used to be an indy game dev. I had to give that up due to cash flow constraints of daily life. I do not want to see this happen to the KSP devs, so I will pay whatever price they put on expansions.
